lines.text: [while B is brushing his teeth]
Damn those cops! Always after the hawkers! May God punish them all.
[B spits on the street]
Are you deaf, meatball girl? Those were criminals that were shot to death!
You bastard! Criminals are humans! Aren't they also human beings? How ungrateful you are! Without them, you're going nowhere! Come with me to sell the meatballs!

You bitch! I'm guessing it's beaten you. Run into these criminals one day, and see if you have all of your money and your jewellery taken away, including your clothes, your bras, your underwear! See if you get dragged to a roof and raped by them one by one!

[throwing her bag of meatball while cursing him]
Go to hell! You son of a bitch. Cursing me like that early in the morning. You'll pay!
Be very careful while you're on duty.
OK, Mom. Stop with all the lectures. When I practice shooting, I hit the targets with 23 out of 24 shots.
Amen. I pray to God everyday that you never miss.
I didn't have enough fun this morning. Now, I want to continue the fun.
Chief B, we were just chatting.
What? Chatting? What is this, a coffee shop or a playground?
Such important things, and you don't inform me. We've been friends since childhood.
To inform you is to get arrested.
[while three suspects are being questioned for the street fight]
You bastards. Now the fight is over, and you wanna keep your mouths shut.
[after the suspects claim their weapons leaving only a machete]
Well, whose is this?
Not mine, not mine.
Could it be mine? Have a guessing game and decide.
Ah sir. I have a headache. I want to see the doctor.
The royal police is no nurse.

[after being told to write down his address]
Sir, I don't know.
So, you can't read or write, but you can fight?
[threatens to hit him over the head]
Don't beat me, sir! I'll attend evening school tomorrow!
Hey, don't bring the pager.
Why?
avoid suspicion.
What suspicion?
Using it to warn our targets.
[while B and Kit climb to a window]
Master?
What "master?" Call me B.
Chief B, we'll have to write a report if we use guns.
We won't tell. Who would know? You're afraid of everything. The gangsters in there all have guns. They could shoot at us anytime.
You're right.
Now, get your tuition fees ready.
What tuiution fees?
That was a lesson for you.
I've ordered the food.
Why so generous? You won't do anything without a purpose.

[about Druggy Shing]
I have to send a longer bait to catch a big fish.
Old boy, in training school, we were taught that cops are never blackmailed.
Sheung Sir, though I am not guilty legally, I feel that killing an innocent kid casts a shadow on my mind constantly.
It was an accident. Be careful in the future.
Careful? Kit was very careful. I've been carrying this gun for over 10 years. Now, I'm beginning to feel its pressure. Maybe I'm too tired. Sheung Sir, I want to rest.
[drops his gun and badge on the table]
